Posts.EditableText:
Hey guys - How do i get hold of the source code for some good sci-fi/horror Quest text games that i can look at and learn from. i'm a beginner and suck at coding but really enjoy making my own games with Quest. Yes i have gone threw all the tutorials but would really like to see the code in the GUI panel of Quest and what it actually does.

I have some great ideas id like to get out there but im fussy with what i will release to the public if its not going to be ready.

Appreciate the help. This is my first post.

Thanks
